00136 void CopyNumberTableModelTest::constructor()
00137 {
00138   cout << endl;
00139   Util::PrintTextFunctionTitle("CopyNumberTableModelTest", "constructor");
00140   Err::setThrowStatus(true);
00141 
00142   return;
00143 
00144   // Missing TsvFile HEADER line.
00145 
00146   cerr << "constructor: missing TsvFile header line..." << endl;;
00147   cerr << "FATAL ERROR expected" << endl;
00148   CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(CopyNumberTableModel(m_rte,
00149                        m_missingHeaderLineFileName), Except);
00150 
00151   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00152 
00153   cerr << "constructor: invalid Gene data value..." << endl;
00154   cerr << "FATAL ERROR expected" << endl;
00155   CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(CopyNumberTableModel(m_rte,
00156                        m_invalidGeneDataFileName), Except);
00157   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00158 
00159   cerr << "constructor: invalid ProbeSet data value..." << endl;
00160   cerr << "FATAL ERROR expected" << endl;
00161   CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(CopyNumberTableModel(m_rte,
00162                        m_invalidProbeSetDataFileName), Except);
00163   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00164 
00165   cerr << "constructor: invalid Allele1 data value..." << endl;
00166   cerr << "FATAL ERROR expected" << endl;
00167   CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(CopyNumberTableModel(m_rte,
00168                        m_invalidAllele1DataFileName), Except);
00169   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00170 
00171   cerr << "constructor: invalid Allele2 data value..." << endl;
00172   cerr << "FATAL ERROR expected" << endl;
00173   CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(CopyNumberTableModel(m_rte,
00174                        m_invalidAllele2DataFileName), Except);
00175   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00176 
00177   cerr << "constructor: empty Sample Name data value..." << endl;
00178   cerr << "FATAL ERROR expected" << endl;
00179   CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(CopyNumberTableModel(m_rte,
00180                        m_emptySampleNameDataFileName), Except);
00181   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00182 
00183   return;
00184 }
